mapper.select: select * from spider_document_url where status = "UNVISITED" limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into spider_document_url(url, status, create_time) select #{url}, #{status}, now() from dual where not exists (select * from spider_document_url where url=#{url}) limit 1
mapper.update: update spider_document_url set status=#{1}, update_time=now() where url = #{0}
